sentences.text: 2017 Notice of Annual General Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Shareholder,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are cordially invited to attend the 2017 Annual General Meeting of Mallinckrodt plc, which will be held on Wednesday, March 1, 2017, at 9:30 a.m., local time, at the Sofitel London Heathrow Hotel, Terminal 5, London Heathrow Airport, London TW6 2GD, United Kingdom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders in Ireland may participate in the Annual General Meeting by audio link at the offices of Arthur Cox, Earlsfort Centre, Dublin 2, Ireland.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details of the business to be presented at the meeting can be found in the accompanying Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We hope you are planning to attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you are able to attend, I encourage you to submit your proxy as soon as possible so that your shares will be represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors and the management of Mallinckrodt, I extend our appreciation for your continued support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yours sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MELVIN D. BOOTH Chairman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPAN Registered In Ireland  No. 522227 Principal Executive Office: 3 Lotus Park, The Causeway, Staines-Upon-Thames, Surrey TW18 3AG, United Kingdom
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF 2017 ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD MARCH 1, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual General Meeting of Mallinckrodt plc (Mallinckrodt or the Company), a company incorporated under the laws of Ireland, will be held on March 1, 2017, at 9:30 a.m., local time, at the Sofitel London Heathrow Hotel, Terminal 5, London Heathrow Airport, London TW6 2GD, United Kingdom, for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. By separate resolutions, to elect as Directors for a period of one year, expiring at the end of the Companys Annual General Meeting of Shareholders in 2018, the following individuals:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Melvin D. Booth (e) JoAnn A. Reed
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) Kneeland C. Youngblood, M.D.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (f) Angus C. Russell
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (j) Joseph A. Zaccagnino
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (g) Virgil D. Thompson
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d) Diane H. Gulyas
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (h) Mark C. Trudeau
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. To hold an advisory non-binding vote to approve the re-appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as the independent auditors of the Company and, by binding vote, to authorize the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors to set the independent auditors remuneration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. To hold an advisory vote to approve the Companys executive compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To authorize the Company and/or any subsidiary of the Company to make market purchases or overseas market purchases of Company shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To authorize the price range at which the Company can re-allot shares that it holds as treasury shares (Special Resolution).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: amendments and (b) Articles of Association to make certain admin 7.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To approve the reduction of Company capital (Special Resolution).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8. To act on such other business as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 1 through 4 are ordinary resolutions, requiring the approval of a simple majority of the votes cast at the meeting, n person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 5 through 7 are special resolutions, requiring the approval of not less than 75% of the votes cast, in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing items are more fully described in the Proxy Statement accompanying this Notice of Annual General Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders as of January 4, 2017, the record date for the Annual General Meeting, are entitled to vote on these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the meeting, following a review of the Company's affairs, management will also present and the auditors will report to shareholders on Mallinckrodts Irish Statutory Accounts for the fiscal year ended September 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders in Ireland may participate in the Annual General Meeting by audio link at the offices of Arthur Cox, Earlsfort Centre, Earlsfort Terrace, Dublin 2, Ireland, at 9:30 a.m. local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See General Information" for further information on participating in the Annual General Meeting in Ireland.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KENNETH L. WAGNER, Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you expect to attend the Annual General Meeting in person, we encourage you to cast your vote promptly so that your shares will be represented and voted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any shareholder entitled to attend and vote at the Annual General Meeting may appoint one or more proxies, who need not be a shareholder(s) of Mallinckrodt to attend, speak and vote on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies may be appointed via the Internet or by phone in the manner set out in our proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alternatively, they may be appointed by depositing a signed instrument of proxy (or proxy card) with Mallinckrodt plc c/o Broadridge, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, NY 11717 (which Broadridge will arrange to forward to Mallinckrodt plcs registered address electronically) or with Mallinckrodt plc, College Business & Technology Park, Cruiserath, Blanchardstown, Dublin 15, Ireland, in each case at least 48 hours before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to appoint a person other than the individuals specified on our proxy card, please contact our Company Secretary and also note that your nominated proxy must attend the Annual General Meeting in person in order for your votes to be cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement, our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended September 30, 2016 and our Irish Statutory Accounts are available to shareholders of record at www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials are also available on the Investor Relations section of our website at www.mallinckrodt.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Questions and Answers about Proxy Materials, Voting, Attending the Meeting and Other General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive this Proxy Statement?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are making this Proxy Statement available to you on or about January 18, 2017 on the Internet, or by delivering printed versions to you by mail, because our Board of Directors is soliciting your proxy to vote at our 2017 Annual General Meeting on March 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement contains information about the items being voted on at the Annual General Meeting and important information about Mallinckrodt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement and the following documents relating to the 2017 Annual General Meeting are available on the Investor Relations section of our website at www.mallinckrodt.com:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Internet Notice of Availability of Proxy Materials;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended September 30, 2016; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Irish Statutory Accounts for the fiscal year ended September 30, 2016 and the reports of the Directors and auditors thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I access the proxy materials and vote my shares?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The instructions for accessing proxy materials and voting can be found in the information you received either by mail or e- mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For shareholders who received a notice by mail about the Internet availability of proxy materials:  You may access the proxy materials and voting instructions over the Internet via the web address provided in the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to access this material and vote, you will need the control number provided on the notice you received in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by following the instructions on the notice or on the website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For shareholders who received a notice by e-mail:  You may access the proxy materials and voting instructions over the Internet via the web address provided in the e-mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to vote, you will need the control number provided in the e-mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by following the instructions in the e-mail or on the website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For shareholders who received the proxy materials by mail:  You may vote your shares by following the instructions provided on the proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by Internet or telephone, you will need the control number provided on the proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by mail, please complete, sign and date the proxy card or voting instruction form and mail it in the accompanying pre-addressed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote at the Annual General Meeting and how many votes do I have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f you owned our ordinary shares at the close of business on the record date, January 4, 2017, then you may vote at the Annual General Meeting by following the procedures outlined in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the close of business on the record date, we had 104,776,826 ordinary shares outstanding and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each ordinary share is entitled to one vote on each matter properly brought before the Annual General Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: May I vote my shares in person at the Annual General Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes, you may vote your shares in person at the Annual General Meeting as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder of record and you wish to vote in person at the Annual General Meeting, you may do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not wish to attend yourself, you may also appoint a proxy or proxies to attend, speak and vote in your place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy does not need to be one of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are not precluded from attending, speaking or voting at the Annual General
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meeting, even if you have completed a proxy form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To appoint a proxy other than our designated officers, please contact our Company Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares and you wish to vote in person at the Annual General Meeting, you must obtain a legal proxy from the bank, brokerage firm or nominee that holds your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need to bring the legal proxy with you to the meeting and hand it in with a signed ballot that you can request at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will not be able to vote your shares at the Annual General Meeting without a legal proxy and a signed ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the Annual General Meeting, we recommend that you also vote by proxy as described above so that your vote will be counted if you later decide not to attend the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the deadline for voting my shares if I do not vote in person at the Annual General Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder of record, you may vote by Internet or by telephone until 11:59 p.m., United States Eastern Time, on February 28, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares held through a bank or brokerage firm, please follow the voting instructions provided by your bank or brokerage firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between holding shares as a shareholder of record and as a beneficial owner of shares held in street name?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold ordinary shares and your name appears in the Register of Members of Mallinckrodt, you are considered the shareholder of record of those shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owner of Shares Held in Street Name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your ordinary shares are held in an account at a brokerage firm, bank, broker-dealer or other similar organization, then you are the beneficial owner of shares held in street name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a beneficial owner, you have the right to direct your bank or brokerage firm how to vote the shares held in your account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change my vote after I have submitted my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Yes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have the right to revoke your proxy before it is voted at the Annual General Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote again on a later date within the proxy voting deadlines described above by Internet or by telephone (only your latest proxy submitted prior to the meeting will be counted), or by signing and returning a new proxy card with a later date, or by attending the meeting and voting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, your attendance at the Annual General Meeting will not automatically revoke a previously submitted proxy unless you actually vote in person at the meeting or file a written instrument with our Company Secretary prior to the start of the meeting requesting that your prior proxy be revoked.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4  MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What happens if I do not give specific voting instructions when I deliver my proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder of record and you:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Indicate when voting by Internet or by telephone that you wish to vote as recommended by our Board of Directors; or  If you sign and return a proxy card without giving specific voting instructions,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: then the Company-designated proxy holders will vote your shares in the manner recommended by our Board of Directors on all matters presented in this Proxy Statement and as the proxy holders may determine in their discretion regarding any other matters properly presented for a vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owners of Shares Held in Street Name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial owner of shares and your bank or brokerage firm does not receive instructions from you about how your shares are to be voted, one of two things can happen, depending on the type of proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) rules, brokers have discretionary power to vote your shares with respect to routine matters, but they do not have discretionary power to vote your shares on non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to NYSE rules, the election of directors, the advisory vote to approve the Companys executive compensation, the approval of amendments to the Company's Memorandum of Association and Articles of Association to make certain administrative amendments, and the approval of the reduction of the Company's capital are considered non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A bank or brokerage firm may not vote your shares with respect to non- routine matters if you have not provided instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We strongly encourage you to submit your proxy and exercise your right to vote as a shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the quorum requirement for the Annual General Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to conduct any business at the Annual General Meeting, holders of a majority of our ordinary shares outstanding and entitled to vote on the record date must be present in person or represented by valid proxies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is called a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be counted for purposes of determining if there is a
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: quorum, whether representing votes for, against or abstained, or broker non-votes, if you:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Are present and vote in person at the meeting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have voted by Internet or by telephone; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have submitted a proxy card or voting instruction form by mail
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming there is a proper quorum of shares represented at the Annual General Meeting, how many shares are required to approve the proposals being voted upon at the Annual General Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The voting requirements for each of the proposals are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal    Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Elect directors    Majority of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Advisory non-binding vote to approve the re-appointment of the independent auditors and binding vote to authorize the Audit Committee of the Board to set the independent auditors remuneration    Majority of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Advisory vote to approve executive compensation    Majority of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Authorization to make market purchases or overseas market purchases of Company shares    Majority of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Authorization of the price at which the Company can reissue shares held as treasury shares (Special Resolution)    75% of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Approval of amendments to the Company's
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) Memorandum of Association to make certain administrative amendments; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Articles of Association to make certain administrative amendments (Special Resolutions)   75% of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. Approval of reduction of Company capital (Special Resolution)    75% of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement   5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How are abstentions and broker non-votes treated?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are considered present for purposes of determining the presence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes will not be considered votes properly cast at the Annual General Meeting pursuant to our Articles of Association.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the approval of all of the proposals is based on the votes properly cast at the Annual General Meeting, abstentions and broker non-votes will not have any effect on the outcome of voting on these proposals under Irish law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a notice in the mail regarding the Internet availability of the proxy materials instead of a paper copy of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As explained in more detail below, we are using the notice and access system adopted by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (the SEC) relating to delivery of our proxy materials over the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, we mailed to many of our shareholders a notice about the Internet availability of the proxy materials instead of a paper copy of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who received the notice will have the ability to access the proxy materials over the Internet and to request a paper copy of the proxy materials by mail, by e-mail or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instructions on how to access the proxy materials over the Internet or to request a paper copy may be found on the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the notice contains instructions on how shareholders may request proxy materials in printed form by mail or electronically by e-mail on an ongoing basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This notice of Internet availability of proxy materials also serves as a Notice of Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What are the notice and access rules and how do they affect the delivery of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SECs notice and access rules allow us to deliver proxy materials to our shareholders by posting the materials on an Internet website, notifying shareholders of the availability of the proxy materials on the Internet and sending paper copies of proxy materials upon shareholder request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the notice and access rules allow us to use Internet technology that many shareholders prefer, continue to provide our shareholders with the information they need and, at the same time, assure more prompt delivery of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice and access rules also lower our cost of printing and delivering the proxy materials and minimize the environmental impact of printing paper copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why didnt I receive a notice in the mail about the Internet availability of the proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who previously elected to access the proxy materials over the Internet will not receive a notice in the mail about the Internet availability of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, you should have received an e-mail with links to the proxy materials and the proxy voting website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, we mailed copies of the proxy materials to shareholders who previously requested to receive paper copies instead of the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper copy of the proxy materials, you may elect to receive future proxy materials electronically by following the instructions on your proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Choosing to receive your future proxy materials by e-mail will help us conserve natural resources and reduce the cost of printing and distributing our proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you choose to receive future proxy materials by e-mail, you will receive an e-mail with instructions containing a link to the website where those materials are available and a link to the proxy voting website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your election to receive proxy materials by e-mail will remain in effect until you terminate it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I attend the Annual General Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders are invited to attend the Annual General Meeting at the Sofitel London Heathrow Hotel, Terminal 5, London Heathrow Airport, London TW6 2GD, United Kingdom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders in Ireland may participate in the Annual General Meeting by audio link at the offices of Arthur Cox, Earlsfort Centre, Earlsfort Terrace, Dublin 2, Ireland.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders of Record.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For admission to the Annual General Meeting, shareholders of record should bring picture identification to the Registered Shareholders check-in area, where ownership will be verified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like someone to attend on your behalf, please contact our Company Secretary prior to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All communications concerning accounts of shareholders of record, ncluding address changes, name changes, inquiries as to requirements to transfer Mallinckrodt ordinary shares and similar issues, can be handled by calling toll-free 1-877-487-1633 (U.S.) or +1-732-645-4170 (outside the U.S.) or by accessing Computershares website at www.computershare.com.

sentences.text: For other information about Mallinckrodt, you can visit our website at www.mallinckrodt.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use our website as a channel of distribution of important company information, such as press releases, investor presentations and other financial information.

sentences.text: We also use our website to expedite public access to time-critical information regarding us in advance of or in lieu of distributing a press release or a filing with the SEC disclosing the same information.

sentences.text: MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement   7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines, general approach to corporate governance and internal policies and procedures are guided by U.S. practice and applicable federal securities laws and regulations and New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we are an Irish public limited company that is tax resident in the United Kingdom, we are not subject to the listing rules of the Irish Stock Exchange or the listing rules of the U.K. Listing Authority and we are therefore not subject to, nor have we adopted, the U.K. Corporate Governance Code or any other non-statutory Irish or U.K. governance standards or guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While there are many similarities and overlaps between the U.S. corporate governance standards we apply and the U.K. Corporate Governance Code and other Irish/U.K. governance standards or guidelines, there are differences, relating in particular to the extent of the authorization to issue share capital and effect share repurchases that may be granted to the board of directors and the criteria for determining the independence of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors believes that good governance requires not only an effective set of specific practices, but also a culture of responsibility throughout an organization, and governance at Mallinckrodt is intended to achieve both.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also believes that good governance ultimately depends on the quality of an organizations leadership, and it is committed to recruiting and retaining directors and officers of proven leadership ability and personal integrity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted Corporate Governance Guidelines designed to assist Mallinckrodt and the Board in implementing effective corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These guidelines, which are reviewed annually by the Nominating and Governance Committee, address, among other things:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director responsibilities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Composition and selection of the Board, including qualification standards and independence guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority voting for directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role of the Chairman of the Board or of an independent Lead Director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board committee establishment, structure and guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Officer and director share ownership requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meetings of non-employee directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director orientation and continuing education;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board access to management and independent advisors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communication with directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and committee self-evaluations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Succession planning and management development reviews;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO performance reviews;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recoupment, or claw-back, of executive compensation; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ethics and conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Guidelines are posted on our website at www.mallinckrodt.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8  MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independence of Nominees for Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As noted above, the Corporate Governance Guidelines include criteria adopted by the Board to guide determinations regarding the independence of its members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The criteria, summarized below, are consistent with the NYSE listing standards regarding director independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered independent, a director must be determined by the Board to have no material relationship, directly or indirectly, with us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In assessing independence, the Board considers all relevant facts and circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, when assessing the materiality of a directors relationship with us, the Board considers the issue not just from the standpoint of the director, but also from that of the persons or organizations with which the director has an affiliation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director will not be considered independent if he or she, at the time of determination:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is, or has been within the prior three years, an employee of Mallinckrodt or any of its subsidiaries;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has an immediate family member who is, or has been within the prior three years, an executive officer of Mallinckrodt;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is a current partner or employee of our external auditor;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has an immediate family member who is a current partner of our external auditor or who is an employee of our external auditor and personally works on our audit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has been, or has an immediate family member who has been, within the prior three years, a partner or employee of our external auditor who personally worked on our audit during that time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is, or has an immediate family member who is, or has been within the prior three years, employed as an executive officer of another company that has or had on the compensation committee of its board of directors one of our executive officers (during the same period of time);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Has, or has an immediate family member who has, received more than $120,000 in direct compensation from Mallinckrodt, other than director and committee fees and pension or other forms of deferred compensation for prior service (provided such compensation is not contingent in any way on continued service), in any 12-month period within the prior three years (compensation received by an immediate family member for service as an employee, other than as an executive officer, is not included for purposes of this determination);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is a current employee, or has an immediate family member who is a current executive officer, of a company that does business with Mallinckrodt and has made payments to, or received payments from, Mallinckrodt for property or services in an amount that, in any of the prior three fiscal years, exceeds the greater of $1 million or 2% of such other companys consolidated gross revenues; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is, or his or her spouse is, an executive officer, director or trustee of a charitable organization to which our contributions, not including our matching of charitable contributions by employees, exceed, in any single fiscal year within the prior three years, the greater of $1 million or 2% of such organizations total charitable receipts during that year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has considered the independence of its members in light of these criteria, has reviewed our relationships with organizations with which our directors are affiliated and has determined that none of these current business relationships is material to us, any of the organizations involved, or our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on these considerations, the Board has determined that each of our directors and director nominees, other than Mark C. Trudeau, our President and Chief Executive Officer, satisfies the criteria and is independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These independent directors are: Melvin D. Booth, David R. Carlucci, J. Martin Carroll, Diane H. Gulyas, JoAnn A. Reed, Angus C. Russell, Virgil D. Thompson, Kneeland C. Youngblood, M.D. and Joseph A. Zaccagnino.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each independent director is expected to notify the chair of the Nominating and Governance Committee, as soon as reasonably practicable, of changes in his or her personal circumstances that may affect the Boards evaluation of his or her independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nominations Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee is responsible for developing the general criteria, subject to approval by the full Board, used in identifying, evaluating and selecting qualified candidates for election or re-election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee periodically reviews with the Board the appropriate skills and characteristics required of Board members in the context of the then-current make-up of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Final approval of director candidates is determined by the full Board, and invitations to join the Board are extended by the Chairman of the Board on behalf of the entire Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement   9
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee, in accordance with our Corporate Governance Guidelines, seeks to create and maintain a Board that is strong in its collective knowledge and has a diversity of backgrounds, skills and experience with respect to accounting and finance, management and leadership, vision and strategy, business operations, business udgment, industry knowledge, corporate governance and global markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Committee reviews a potential new candidate, the Committee looks specifically at the candidates qualifications in light of our needs and the needs of the Board at that time, given the then-current mix of director attributes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As described in our Corporate Governance Guidelines:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors should be individuals of the highest ethical character and integrity;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors should have demonstrated management ability at senior levels in successful organizations, including as the chief executive officer of a public company or as the leader of a large, multifaceted organization, including government, educational and other non-profit organizations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director should have the ability to provide wise, informed and thoughtful counsel to senior management on a range of issues and be able to express independent opinions, while at the same time working as a member of a team;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors should be free from any conflict of interest or business or personal relationship that would interfere with the duty of loyalty owed to us; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors should be independent of any particular constituency and be able to represent all of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee assesses independence and also monitors compliance by the members of he Board with the requisite qualifications under NYSE listing standards for populating the Audit, Human Resources and Compensation and Nominating and Governance Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may not serve on more than four public company boards of directors (including ours).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the director is employed as CEO of a publicly traded company, the director may serve on no more than three public company boards of directors (including ours).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As provided in its charter, the Nominating and Governance Committee will consider nominations submitted by shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To recommend a nominee, a shareholder should write to our Company Secretary at our registered address, Mallinckrodt plc, College Business & Technology Park, Cruiserath, Blanchardstown, Dublin 15, Ireland.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any such recommendation must include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The name and address of the candidate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A brief biographical description, including his or her occupation for at least the last five years, and a statement of the qualifications of the candidate, taking into account the qualification requirements set forth above; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The candidates signed consent to serve as a director if elected and to be named in our proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendation must also include documentary evidence of ownership of our ordinary shares if the shareholder is a beneficial owner, as well as the date the shares were acquired and the name and address of the shareholder, as required by our Articles of Association.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered by the Nominating and Governance Committee for nomination and inclusion in our proxy statement for the 2018 Annual General Meeting, a shareholder recommendation for director must be received by our Company Secretary not earlier than the close of business on November 1, 2017 and not later than the close of business on December 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once our Company Secretary receives the recommendation, we will deliver a questionnaire to the candidate requesting additional information about the candidates independence, qualifications and other information that would assist the Nominating and Governance Committee in evaluating the candidate, as well as certain information that must be disclosed about the candidate in our proxy statement, if nominated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates must complete and return the questionnaire within the time frame provided to be considered for nomination by the Nominating and Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee also receives suggestions for director candidates from Board members and, in its discretion, may also employ a third-party search firm to assist in identifying candidates for director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All 10 of our nominees for director are current members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In evaluating candidates for director, the Committee uses the guidelines described above, and evaluates shareholder candidates in the same manner as candidates proposed from all other sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its evaluation, the Nominating and Governance Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 10  MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: recommended each of the nominees for election by the shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More information regarding each director nominees qualifications can be found in Proposal 1 later in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority Vote for Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected by the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast by shareholders at the Annual General Meeting (present in person or by proxy) and serve for one-year terms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any nominee for director who does not receive a majority of the votes cast is not elected to the Board and the position that would have been filled by such nominee will become vacant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given that Irish law does not recognize the concept of a holdover director, incumbent directors who do not receive a majority of the votes cast at the Annual General Meeting are not re-elected to the Board, and immediately following the Annual General Meeting, will no longer be members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Irish law does require, however, a minimum of two directors at all times.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an election results in either only one or no directors receiving the required majority vote, either the nominee or each of the two nominees receiving the greatest number of votes in favor of his or her election shall, in accordance with our Articles of Association, hold office until his or her successor(s) is elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors meet in executive session, without members of management present, at each regularly scheduled Board meeting and at such other times as may be deemed appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These executive sessions also may include a discussion with our Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since our separation from Covidien in June 2013, the positions of Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer have been held by separate people, due in part to the fact that we are a relatively new independent public company, no longer part of a conglomerate, and also to the fact that the Board is relatively newly constituted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board provides leadership to the Board and works with the Board to define its structure and activities in the fulfillment of its responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board sets the Board agendas with Board and management input, facilitates communication among directors, provides an appropriate information flow to the Board and presides at meetings of the Board and shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board works with other Board members to provide strong, independent oversight of our management and affairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Future modification of the Board leadership structure will be made at the sole discretion of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A more detailed description of the role and responsibilities of the Chairman of the Board are set forth in our Corporate Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted the Mallinckrodt Guide to Business Conduct, which applies to all of our employees, officers and directors and meets the requirements of a code of ethics as defined by SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guide to Business Conduct also meets the requirements of a code of business conduct and ethics under the listing standards of the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Guide to Business Conduct is posted on our website, www.mallinckrodt.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will disclose any material amendments to the Guide to Business Conduct, as well as any waivers for executive officers or directors, on our website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement   11
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board oversees an enterprise-wide approach to risk management designed to support the achievement of organizational objectives, including strategic objectives, to improve long-term organizational performance and enhance shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A fundamental part of risk management is not only understanding the risks we face and what steps management is taking to manage those risks, but also understanding what level of risk is appropriate for us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The involvement of the full Board in approving our business strategy is a key part of its assessment of managements appetite for risk and the determination of what constitutes an appropriate level of risk for us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this process, risk is assessed throughout the business, focusing on three primary areas: financial risk, legal/compliance risk and operational/strategic risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the full Board has the ultimate oversight responsibility for the risk management process, various committees of the Board also have responsibility for risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, the Audit Committee focuses on financial risk, including internal controls, and receives an annual risk assessment report from our internal auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compliance Committee assists the Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibility with respect to regulatory, healthcare compliance and public policy issues that affect us and work closely with our legal and regulatory groups.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, in setting compensation, the Human Resources and Compensation Committee strives to create incentives that encourage a level of risk-taking behavior consistent with our business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compliance Committee conducts an annual assessment of the risk management process and reports its findings to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Risk Assessment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the direction of the Human Resources and Compensation Committee, representatives of our human resources department conducted a risk assessment of our compensation policies and practices during fiscal 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This risk assessment consisted of a review of cash and equity compensation provided to our employees, with a focus on compensation payable to senior executives and incentive compensation plans that provide variable compensation to other employees based upon Company and individual performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources and Compensation Committee and its independent consultant reviewed the findings of this assessment and agreed with the conclusion that our compensation programs are designed with the appropriate balance of risk and reward in relation to our overall business strategy and do not create risk that is reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following characteristics of our compensation programs support this finding:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our use of different types of compensation vehicles that provide a balance of long- and short-term incentives with fixed and variable components;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our use of a variety of performance metrics, both absolute (e.g., adjusted EPS) and relative to our peers (e.g., total shareholder return);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our practice of looking beyond results-oriented performance in assessing the contributions of a particular executive;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our share ownership requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation clawback policy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ability of the Human Resources and Compensation Committee to reduce incentive payouts if deemed appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging/Anti-Pledging Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Insider Trading Policy prohibits directors, officers and employees from entering into or trading in puts, calls, cashless collars, options or similar rights and obligations or any other hedging activity involving our securities, other than the exercise of a Company-issued stock option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our policy also prohibits directors, officers and employees from purchasing our securities on margin, borrowing against our securities held in a margin account or pledging our securities as collateral for a loan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, an exception may be granted by our General Counsel if the individual clearly demonstrates the financial capacity to repay the loan without resort to the pledged securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions with Related Persons
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Governance Committee is responsible for the review and, if appropriate, approval or ratification of related-person transactions involving us or our subsidiaries and related persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under SEC rules, a related person is a director, nominee for director, executive officer or a beneficial owner of 5% or more of our ordinary shares, and their immediate family members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted written policies and procedures that apply to any transaction or series of transactions in which we or one of our subsidiaries is a participant, the amount involved exceeds $120,000 and a related person has a direct or indirect material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communications with the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established a process for interested parties to communicate with members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have a concern, question or complaint regarding our compliance with any policy or law, or would otherwise like to contact the Board, you may reach the Board via e-mail at board.directors@mallinckrodt.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A direct link to this e-mail address can be found on our website.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also submit communications in writing or by phone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please refer to the Board contact information that can be found at www.mallinckrodt.com/Company_Contacts/.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All concerns and inquiries are received and reviewed promptly by the Office of the General Counsel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any significant concerns relating to accounting, internal controls or audit matters are reviewed with the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All concerns will be addressed by the Office of the General Counsel, unless otherwise instructed by the Audit Committee or the Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The status of all outstanding concerns is reported to the Chairman of the Board and the Audit Committee on a quarterly basis, and any concern that is determined to pose an immediate threat to us or concern one of our senior officials (any executive officer or any direct report to the President and Chief Executive Officer) is immediately communicated to the Chair of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board or the Audit Committee may determine that certain matters should be presented to the full Board and may direct the retention of outside counsel or other advisors in connection with any concern addressed to them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Mallinckrodt Guide to Business Conduct prohibits any employee from retaliating against anyone for raising or helping to resolve an integrity question.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business, property and affairs are managed under the direction of the Board of Directors, which currently is comprised of 10 members.

sentences.text: The Audit Committee monitors the integrity of our financial statements, the independence and qualifications of the independent auditors, the performance of our internal auditors and independent auditors, our compliance with certain legal and regulatory requirements and the effectiveness of our internal controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for selecting, retaining, evaluating, setting the remuneration of and, if appropriate, recommending the termination of our independent auditors.

sentences.text: COMPENSATION OF NON-EMPLOYEE DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has approved a compensation structure for non-employee directors consisting of equity awards, an annual cash retainer and supplemental cash retainers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This compensation structure was determined in conjunction with the Nominating and Governance Committee, after reviewing data and analyses from the Nominating and Governance Committees independent compensation consultant, Willis Towers Watson.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash Retainers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The cash retainers are paid in four quarterly installments at the end of each quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors joining the Board other than on the first day of a quarter receive a cash retainer pro-rated for the number of days served during their initial quarter of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2016, the annual cash retainer for all directors was $100,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee Chairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of the Audit Committee receives a supplemental annual cash retainer of $25,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chair of the Human Resources and Compensation Committee receives a supplemental annual cash retainer of $20,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairs of the Compliance Committee, the Nominating and Governance Committee and the Portfolio Committee each receive a supplemental annual cash retainer of $15,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee Members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of a committee (excluding committee chairs) receives a supplemental annual cash retainer of $5,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Executive Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our non-executive Chairman receives a supplemental annual cash retainer of $50,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the time of our 2016 Annual General Meeting, each non-employee director received an annual grant of restricted units with a value of $225,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2016, the annual grant value was increased by $70,000 to $295,000 and each director received a grant of restricted units with a value of $70,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, our non-executive Chairman received, at the time of our 2016 Annual General Meeting, additional restricted units with a value of $112,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2016 awards vest on the earlier of March 16, 2017 or the date of our 2017 Annual General Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New directors receive a pro-rated annual equity grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A pro-rated annual equity grant will not be granted to any new director who commences service less than three months prior to the vesting date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Matching Gift Program, we match employee and director contributions to charitable organizations up to $2,500.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are also reimbursed for reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred in attending Board meetings, committee meetings and shareholder meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are provided with chartered private or commercial aircraft in order to travel to and from such meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Share Retention and Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As set forth in our Corporate Governance Guidelines, all non-employee directors are required to hold Mallinckrodt ordinary shares with a market value of at least five times the annual cash retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining a directors ownership, shares held directly as well as shares underlying restricted units subject to time-based vesting (less a 40% tax assumption) are included.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares underlying unexercised stock options are not included in the calculation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Until the required ownership level is achieved, the non-employee directors are required to retain net after tax shares received upon vesting of restricted units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION OF EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mallinckrodt is a global specialty pharmaceutical company dedicated to its mission: Managing Complexity, Improving Lives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Acquire to Invest business model is applied to therapies that aid healthcare providers in treating patients, ncluding small, underserved populations who may be challenged by devastating conditions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We invest in areas such as autoimmune and rare diseases; immunotherapy and neonatal respiratory critical care therapies; analgesics and hemostasis products; and central nervous system drugs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our investment in these medicines -- both in development and after approval -- provides clinical and economic data to help clinicians as they make treatment choices, and in some instances is introducing long approved medications to a whole new generation of physicians and, ultimately, patients.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equally important, we invest in our people -- hiring the best and offering ample opportunities for caree growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fiscal 2016 Performance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fiscal 2016 was an important year for Mallinckrodt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continued to make great progress against our overall strategic objective: to create a highly successful, diversified, specialty pharmaceutical business providing valuable therapies for underserved patient populations in areas of high unmet medical need, creating good jobs and a rich diverse workplace for our employees, and driving growth and profitability by investing in our products to reach new patients and deliver long- erm value to our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the year, we made great strides in transforming our portfolio, delivering near-term value on our acquisitions and continuing to create platforms on which to drive organic growth for many years to come.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key performance highlights for fiscal 2016 include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Net sales were $3.381 billion, compared with $2.923 billion in the prior year, representing a 15.7% increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The increase was primarily driven by the full year inclusion of INOMAX and Therakos immunotherapy net sales along with Acthar net sales growth within the Specialty Brands segment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These increases were partially offset by decreased sales in all Specialty Generics categories due to increased competition;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Income from continuing operations was $489.0 million, compared with $236.6 million in fiscal 2015;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Diluted earnings per share from continuing operations were $4.39 compared with $2.00 in fiscal 2015;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Net cash provided by operating activities was $1,184.6 million, compared with $896.4 million in fiscal 2015
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We further expanded our Specialty Brands business through the acquisition of three commercial hemostasis products and the development product StrataGraft regenerative skin tissue; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We completed the divestiture of our Contrast Media and Delivery Systems business and announced the planned divestiture of our Nuclear Imaging business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 18  MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation program is designed to motivate our executives to achieve financial, operational and strategic performance goals that we believe will benefit diverse patient populations with unmet medical needs and drive ong-term value for our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The program is weighted toward incentive and stock-based compensation so that executives actual realized compensation will be higher when we achieve these goals and lower when we under perform.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We understand and expect our executives will be highly motivated to pursue our objectives, and have implemented policies and practices to discourage excessive risk-taking behavior.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Guiding Principles for Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Align our Programs with Shareholder Interests, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Design our pay programs to help ensure that the long-term incentive pay and the funding of a significant portion of short-term incentive pay of our executives are linked to our overall performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maintain market aligned share ownership requirements, including 5 times base salary for our President and Chief Executive Officer ("CEO") and 3 times base salary for our other executive officers, which helps to ensure that they have a significant stake in our long-term success;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Grant equity awards that generally vest over a minimum three-year period;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide a mix of performance and time vesting equity vehicles;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibit the repricing or exchange of equity awards without shareholder approval; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review our compensation programs and policies to ensure they do not encourage excessive risk-taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Develop High Caliber Talent, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have the Human Resources and Compensation Committee ("HRCC") oversee executive talent and succession planning processes, not just strictly compensation decisions;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Involve HRCC members in the executive officer selection process;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conduct annual Management Talent Reviews that assess critical organization capabilities, executive team performance, succession depth and retention risk;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Share results of the Management Talent Review for our most senior executives with the HRCC;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicit performance feedback from the full Board regarding our CEO's performance; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Require annual performance evaluations for all executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Motivate Executives and Align Pay with Performance, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maintain executive compensation principles to support and drive our values, business strategies, and goals;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Weight our executive compensation mix heavily toward variable, rather than fixed compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Design our programs to differentiate payouts based on business and individual performance;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ensure that our programs deliver below target compensation to executives in years with below target performance and deliver above target compensation to executives in years with above target performance; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Include both relative and absolute performance metrics in our long-term performance units program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Attract and Retain High Caliber Talent, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Set our target executive compensation structure competitively with our defined market for talent;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review our executive compensation peer group on a regular basis to help ensure it is representative of our market for talent and our business portfolio;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use multiple industry surveys and advisory resources to help ensure a current understanding of changing market competitive practices; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide market competitive benefits for our executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MALLINCKRODT PUBLIC LIMITED COMPANY  Proxy Statement   19
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: COMPENSATION DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Practice Sound Governance, we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Have an executive compensation clawback policy that allows us to recover performance-based cash and equity incentive compensation paid to executives in various circumstances;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Do not enter into long-term employment contracts with our executive officers (except as required outside the United States);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Require "double trigger" severance upon a change in control;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibit directors, officers and employees from entering into or trading in puts, calls, cashless collars, options or similar rights and obligations involving our securities, other than the exercise of a Company-issued stock option;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibit tax gross-ups to our executives other than for relocation expenses, limited business-related benefits or in connection with expatriate / international assignments; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Engage an independent compensation consultant as an advisor to the HRCC and formally review the advisor's performance and independence annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that executive compensation programs play a key role in driving our performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In future years, we expect to continue to drive performance in our business by rewarding executives who deliver strong results that benefit patients and shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Named Executive Officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of the Compensation Discussion and Analysis ("CD&A") and executive compensation disclosures, the individuals listed below are referred to collectively as our named executive officers ("NEOs").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark Trudeau, President and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Matthew Harbaugh, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Frank Scholz, Executive Vice President of Global Operations and President, Specialty Generics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Hugh ONeill, Executive Vice President and President, Autoimmune and Rare Diseases.

sentences.text: 2016 Compensation Program
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table summarizes the three major elements of our executive compensation program and the objective of each element.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They are designed to work together, and the HRCC views the executive compensation program as an ntegrated total compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mix of compensation elements varies based on an executives position and responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Element Key Features Objective Base salary Fixed cash compensation Offer a stable income, intended to reflect the market value of the executives role, with differentiation for strategic significance, individual capability and experience Annual incentive compensation Market-competitive, performance-based cash bonus opportunity tied to achievement of Company and individual goals   Initial calculation for each executive's annual Focus executives on pre-set patient, employee and shareholder value objectives each year and drive specific behaviors that foster short- and long-term growth and profitability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: cash incentive is based on performance versus pre-determined goals for corporate performance measures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, each executive's individual performance can modify the amount received
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
